website_summaries.verdict: Versatile neck gaiter with a number of stylish patterns to choose from. Appropriate for indoor and outdoor activities. Appealing price point.
pros: Very effective as a windbreaker for lower face
Lightweight, can be worn indoors comfortably
cons: Inexpensive material does not insulate well

customer_reviews.title: Love this neckwarmer/face warmer
customer_reviews.text: So far I have only worn this neck warmer twice but I love it already. I wore it on a day I was outside for 5 1/2 hours at a barn in 20 degree weather with a steady wind. My neck and face stayed warm though those long hours. The second time was in 40 degree weather - I folded up the neck warmer so that it wasn't so warm on my neck and that was perfect too. A great addition to my active winter gear! It fits my (adult) neck perfectly: loose but tight enough to keep my neck warm.
customer_reviews.author: DoritoChip

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic neck warmer. Soft, fleece lined. Wore for running in cold weather. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic neck warmer. Fleece lined for comfort and warmth. Lightweight, have worn it several times for running during cold weather; didn't even feel it on but it kept the cold wind off my neck. Used it also on a chilly day with a cold breeze and pulled it up to breath through a couple of times and it worked great! Really cut through the cold and gave me some much needed warm breaths. This could easily be worn as an ear warmer but I haven't used it that way yet. Very comfortable and it's nice to have something lightweight to keep the neck warm. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Musicbookfan

customer_reviews.title: Looking good on the slopes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a snowboarding trip. It worked perfectly to keep my face and nose warm on the slopes. I love the versatility of it, and the cool print fabric is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: AmberC

customer_reviews.title: Great neck warmer
customer_reviews.text: I love this neck warmer - it is fleece on the inside and a great colorful print on the other side. I wore it in 20 degree snowy weather with 20 mph gusts. Kept me warm skiing and on the lifts. Definitely recommend - going to look at other prints as a backup.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Berger

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is warm and it's 10F here. The interior is black, sort of a heavier, silkier t-shirt type material and the exterior is about the same thickness and printed. I have received 3 compliments the first 2 days I've worn it, so it's not rough looking! I have a moderately big head but an average neck. It's tight to pull on and off but that means it keeps my neck and mouth / chin / nose warm. I love it for walking from building to building in this weather. I have approximately .25mi to walk from our main building to my building.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Great neck warmer at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great neck warmer at a great price. I live in the northeast where winter time can be brutally cold. This neck warmer is perfect for those miserably frigid days. It is made of a comfortable fleece and microfiber material. It fits great around my neck and is stretchy enough that it can be worn over my face. I can also pull it up on my head to wear it as headband or hat. It washed and dried well in my washing machine and dryer. Plus it comes in some beautiful colors and patterns!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: I have a coat that zips up to my chin but is not warm enough for my neck. most scarves are too thick to stuff in there. this neck warmer fits nicely with little bulk. it's just a little bit too loose to keep me warm enough in extremely cold weather, but it's great for above 30 degrees or so. my only complaint: I wish this was longer with a wider bottom so I could nestle this down around my shoulders more. and it's a little bit hard to pull over my head. it will mess up your hair every single time, LOL.
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings but mostly positive
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Beautiful sugar skull pattern, nice and warm, seems to be well made. Cons: There are 2 seams in the patterned fabric, but only one on the plain black fleece, which seems minor but is REALLY annoying aesthetically. If going for the convenience of not worrying about what is front/back, this fails. Suggestion: Either remove the extra seem, or redesign for a definitive front and back. Add a decorative tag to the front or back hem and/or make the front a little longer so it's not just a tube.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T

customer_reviews.title: Great pseudo mask for now/neck warmer later
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I’m rarely in super-cold weather, and I tend to be warm-blooded. But when I was searching for something that would function as a face covering, I bought this item. It fits the bill. It’s also soft and comfortable. And yes, I will wear it next winter when hopefully our nightmare will be resolved in some way. I appreciate the positive customer service - following up to see whether the neck warmer met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Jane D.

customer_reviews.title: Way too short!
customer_reviews.text: Product is very short. It will work to warm your neck or as a hat but WILL NOT work to warm your neck and pull up as a hat.. it’s way too short. After this review posted, the company contacted me to offer a refund because I was not happy with their product. I must say, I am very impressed with the customer service and responsiveness, and I would be happy to use Tough hardware again. Great company to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Barbour

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but could be stretchier
customer_reviews.text: The blue flowery pattern is super cute. I'd like the material to stretch more, though. When I pull it up so that it's under my ski helmet and up to my nose, I think I talk a little funny. Like Rudolph. Because it's snug over my lips! I've washed it twice and the colored fabric has pilled more than I'd like but it doesn't affect its usefulness.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy W

customer_reviews.title: Good quality... not paisley or bandana print
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was getting a black paisley or banana print neck warmer. It was the Mexican day of the dead skull design instead. I'm sure some people would be thrilled, but I wouldn't have bought it if I'd known - I just don't wear skull designs. The quality of the warmer looks very good. The inside fabric is soft. I'll keep it, but boy was I surprised by the style. If the description mentioned the skull, I missed it.
customer_reviews.author: Neb688

customer_reviews.title: Overall great quality, cute design, works really well.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a face cover for skiing. It arrived super fast. The design is so cute. The inside is a soft black fleece (or similar material). It works perfectly for skiing. It is tight enough to stay on my face, but not too tight. No one likes the feeling of their face being sat on while you're trying to ski down a mountain...save the for later... Overall great quality, cute design, works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Tia James

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not snug enough
customer_reviews.text: I liked the description and picture on the website. That's why I bought it. I like the color/pattern and the fact that it is fleece-lined. However, it is not snig enough for me. I'm petite and have a slender neck. It is way too big and is not stretchy. So, if you wear it when it's windy/cold, you will definitely feel it. However, I think I'm going to keep it because i'm not able to find other neck gaiters to fit me.
customer_reviews.author: Dsp4144

customer_reviews.title: Good ear warmer
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this around my neck but have found that as a head band it keeps the wind out of my ears so that I can walk the dogs comfortably in 30-34 degree weather, even when their is a wind advisory in effect. I also wear a knitted cap over the headband with my sunglasses between the two so I have no gap caused by the glasses to let cold air in. The fit is similar to Buff bands. I plan on getting several for this winter.
customer_reviews.author: bar

customer_reviews.title: ... was given one of these as a gift and liked it so much that I bought a couple more
customer_reviews.text: I was given one of these as a gift and liked it so much that I bought a couple more. It keeps my neck warm when the house is a little cool and I don't want to wear a bulky sweatshirt. I gave one to my son, who loves it when he goes snowboarding because he can use it to cover his chin or lower face if needed. It's soft, reversible and very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: karen denny mathon

customer_reviews.title: So much better than a bulky scarf
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this neck warmer! I purchased the Budapest design, and the colors are vibrant, but even better, it works so well. I wear this when I go out to walk my dogs. Now that the weather is cold and often windy, I can endure these walks much more easily. I don't really like wearing a bulky scarf especially if it's rainy. I love the soft, comfy feel of the fleece side. This was a great find, and I'll probably purchase other designs.
customer_reviews.author: Wallflower

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the black and white paisley design for my wife and I am totally discussed with what I got. The design is a grotesque skull and bones pattern that is not obvious in any of the product photos! Maybe some teenage snowboarder would like this but its shown by a smiling women and I repeat the skull and bones is not obvious. So now I have the hassle and expensive of returning something that was falsely advertised. This company show be ashamed.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm - does the job
customer_reviews.text: This kept my neck and lower face quite warm today while snowboarding in 15 degree, slightly breezy weather today. It got pretty sweaty quickly, but even in a sweaty condition it kept my face warm. It had an appropriate level of elasticity to it - just stretchy enough to pull over your head onto your neck, but not so loose that you can't pull the front up over your mouth while it's on your neck and have it stay there. The design added a nice pop of color to my otherwise boring slope attire.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney P

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for mom!
customer_reviews.text: My mom really liked this neck warmer that I gave as an xmas present. She is going on a ski trip. It has a very warm lining which will be perfect. I think the coloring is prettier in person. I got it because it also is bright and identifiable when skiing/snowboarding with friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Soph

customer_reviews.title: Best neck warmer in every way
customer_reviews.text: This is the best neck warmer I have found anywhere. It is cozy warm and maintains its shape (unlike my experience with Turtle Fur). I work on a horse farm where we deal with cold winds blowing across a lake regularly and this has made all the difference in the world in terms of staying warm. I have now purchased three of these - one for work, one for non-work wear and one as a gift. It is so comfortable I have been known to wear it all day - inside and out.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy 203

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really like this neck Warmer. It is a lot more comfortable than my old fleece. I also have a light-weight cloth/non fleece that I like. This neck Warmer is warmer than the cloth and not as bulky as the old fleece. Important to know is that is not long and will not go up over your head but it is a great neck warmer and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Active 70+ women

customer_reviews.title: Great Neck Warmer!
customer_reviews.text: We just got back from our ski trip and these neck warmers did their job! It was pretty cold and we used these several different ways...as neck warmers, over the head and under helmet below the chin and above the mouth and also covering our mouths. Its multifunctional and it fit myself and my two kids (10 & 11). I would definitely buy again if I needed more!
customer_reviews.author: LovetoShop

customer_reviews.title: warm, cozy, beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and immediately wanted to keep it! A neck gaiter is such a practical item, and this one is lightweight, warm fleece, lined with a lovely pattern in soft fabric on the other side. I know it will be a hit with the recipient, who hates to wear scarves but complains about feeling cold around her neck. A GREAT gift - just a bit "outside the box."
customer_reviews.author: Amy Q.

customer_reviews.title: Strong Chemical Odor!
customer_reviews.text: It has a very strong chemical odor to it and is just a tube of material - I don't see how it could possibly stay up on your face. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: K. M.

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely soft and warm. Good for playing outside, taking the dog for a walk. Not great for a runner. The inside lining moves and gets sucked into your mouth while breathing heavy. Good for the neck while running though. If you're looking to cover your face and run, this isn't for you. If you're looking just to keep your neck/face warm while outside, this works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Catlady27

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, slightly thin and muted colors but still better than a lot of competition
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good value, my only real gripe is the whites/blacks are slightly muted. It feels soft, fits well on my face (I'm a large guy with a big head though), and has lasted several ski trips, staying in place keeping my lower face warm. Looks really cool on the slopes too!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Ansari

customer_reviews.title: IF YOUR NECK GETS COLD YOU WILL LOVE THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Warm. Warm. WARM! Love this and love the design Con: a bit snug pulling over head and working around long hair but once in place it is great. I did adjust with pulling/stretching so it wasn't quite so snug on face and that did the trick Overall: I would order again. And again. Super nice and I am eager to use it for rides on motorcycle as temps fall. This could be what I need for comfort during cold months with wind in face!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SnapHap45

customer_reviews.title: Cute and warm
customer_reviews.text: Cute and warm!! Purchase this item for all the mini colors which provides a one scarf packing option for a week long trip as I will be able to wear with a multiple of different colored shirts. It’s very soft and super warm and can be used as a neck warmer or pulled up around your mouth and nose
customer_reviews.author: smh0462

customer_reviews.title: great for trekking...
customer_reviews.text: used this during a two week trek through NZ. Great to warm the neck or keep the ears warm while kayaking or just dressing up a plain shell for a casual dinner out on the town. would buy another if there was a pattern I liked.
customer_reviews.author: D. Beardsley

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding gaiter!!!
customer_reviews.text: I walk 3 miles every morning regardless of the Minnesota weather and I’m VERY fussy about my neck/chin comfort - it was -5 wind chill this morning and my first outing with this gaiter was a HUGE success! Very warm and comfy!!! And if there had been anyone else out braving the cold, they would have seen how cute this gaiter was too!
customer_reviews.author: Razor

customer_reviews.title: Warm and snug
customer_reviews.text: This little neck warmer is great for winter adventures. Will keep your neck warm. The material is thick so it stands stiff on its own to keep your neck and chin covered. Can also be used to cover your freezing face. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: A little tight
customer_reviews.text: Loved this and was able to use it other ways, but it was really tight on the face. Let the company know and they gave me a refund. I made a suggestion to them to maybe make it adjustable some how but got the product fast and does keep up warm.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie

customer_reviews.title: Haven't taken it off since it came this morning!
customer_reviews.text: It's cute and cozy. I bought it for running to wear around my neck in the colder weather. You can also use it as a headband or to cover your face when it's windy. It's lightweight and fits well (I am a 120 lb woman.) The inside is a bit fuzzy but not so much that it will feel gross when you are sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: JK Pags

customer_reviews.title: Very good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Nice, warm neck fleece. Customer service by "Tough Headwear" is exemplary. I wrote them a note explaining, they may want to write a different description for the black and white paisley.. It's actually skulls, which wouldn't have been my choice had I known. I asked for nothing in return, just wanted to make that suggestion. They responded right back and offered either a refund or another one. Good quality product, great customer service..........what more could one ask.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Just enough coverage
customer_reviews.text: This neck warmer was perfect on our recent trip to Ireland. It kept the chill out just enough without making me feel suffocated. On particularly windy days or if we were hiking on the gusty cliffs, I was able to pull it up over my ears and mouth for extra protection. My favorite part was that I barely knew I had it on... no bulky scarves to worry about. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and warm!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this neck warmer for work. I am outside quite a lot and the weather is supposed to be in the teens and twenties around here for the foreseeable future so I figured I had better gear up. I've only warn it once so far but it's really soft and lined with fleece so it felt really nice on my neck. So far so good. I'm not sure how it would be if you were sweating a lot in it... may get too hot which may pose a problem but I'll cross that bridge when I get there. All in all I am very happy with this warmer and look forward to wearing it all winter.
customer_reviews.author: Whit

customer_reviews.title: Winter face covers
customer_reviews.text: I have nerve damage on my face and I thought this I could try this in the winter but because of the severe pain I still couldn’t wear this so I had to give this away to someone that could wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Cardona

customer_reviews.title: Colors very subdued
customer_reviews.text: I love love this!! Extremely warm and comfy- for a ski trip. Bought it to match some red accessories but the colors are kinda faded. My accessories stand out more. The scarf is very muted. Other than that fantastic product I do NOT regret the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kay Jay

customer_reviews.title: not double layer of fleece,
customer_reviews.text: I mistakenly thought this was a double layer of fleece. The outer layer is not fleet, but some thin material, but the lining IS fleece at least. Feels nice, but not a thick as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: To tight....
customer_reviews.text: The material was really nice I just wish it was loose around my neck but it was to tight which I couldn’t even use it as a face mask because it was super tight its probably more to use as a head band.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in lieu of a mask, to cover my nose and mouth. From the start, it didn't stay up, covering my mouth or my nose, it just fell down to my chin. For my purposes, it was a complete waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy G.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, perfect fit and warm to boot!
customer_reviews.text: I like the snug fit, I won't have to keep adjusting or pulling it up while using it for skiing, snowshoeing, running, etc. It's exacty what I was looking for and the price can't be beat! The print is fun and eye catching unlike most neck warmers out there, with added bonus of fleece! 👍
customer_reviews.author: ae

customer_reviews.title: Antarctica Tested and Approved!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to have as a secondary neck gaiter on a trip to Antarctica and it beat out my more expensive, merino wool neck gaiter by Smartwool. This one is warm and comfortable. It can be easily worn to cover your mouth and ears and if stays in place! My Smartwool one wouldn't stay in place. I used this every day. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t wait for this to arrive! I was so excited to be able to wear this on my long walks on campus from my dorm to class! This product is amazing! The reviews were right! I love this! The fleece on the inside of the neck warmer is so soft and helps block the wind from your face! The pattern is cute and I will definitely be buying more for myself and family! Better than a scarf at blocking the wind, still stylish, affordable and practically for so many uses! Thank you so much Tough Headwear! So glad I bought this neck warmer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and warm for the winter. I used it on a warm day to cover mouth/nose and I was on the verge of sweaty after 45 mins and my glasses were fogging up. Would have been ok for shorter-term use. I have not used it as a bandana or another purpose. Good price point. Bought three.
customer_reviews.author: More4me

customer_reviews.title: Warm when it's windy
customer_reviews.text: It keeps me warm when delivering on the beach. I have washed it 3 times (first time when I received it) the stitching is coming loose separating the black side from the print side but nothing a whip stitch can't handle. Will be buying another in the future.
customer_reviews.author: br20042003

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and cozy medium-weight gaiter
customer_reviews.text: This goes with so many different solid-colored jackets, and I have a few, so that's why I bought this. It's pretty, and the lining keeps me warm on a cold ski day. It's not heavy-duty, but it's good for most conditions. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: AnnLD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Functional
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Christmas gift and she absolutely Loves it! It's soft and comfortable and very warm and it can be used in different ways which is always a plus in the wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Nunn

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of this neck warmer. Nice fabric on outside with warm fleece inside. Looks great and keep my neck toasty. slips easily over my head. I feel so cold when wind is on my neck and cheeks. This really makes a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: I did like this product. If you were using it for a headband or to workout it would be great. I wanted to use it for when I rode are motorcycle. It definitely is not warm like I was looking for. It is soft and of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: eraser1369

customer_reviews.title: Great for winter running!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for running in sub-freezing temps to keep my lungs from freezing, and it works really well. It's soft, warm and doesn't get completely soaked through with sweat after 20 minutes. It's a little bigger than I expected, but it still stayed on my face while covering my neck down to my collar bone. And for an extra bonus, the prints are really stylish. Highly recommend, especially at the $9 sale price!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Keep the Cold Away !!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to pull up over your face when the brutal cold attacks !! Initially I purchased two of the fleece neck warmers & subsequently ordered two more for stocking stuffers. From a faux turtle neck print to a hat in just a tug. Makes the trip to the mailbox (about 100' away) bearable the last couple days. So far the fleece has not "pilled" when laundered. However, I did not throw into washer & dryer either. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne

customer_reviews.title: Warm and stylish.
customer_reviews.text: This isn't as thick as my husband's fleece gaiter that I occasionally used, and I was afraid it wouldn't be warm enough for our winter hikes, but I was wrong. It looks stylish and is plenty warm.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T.

customer_reviews.title: Works Well!
customer_reviews.text: The actual colors are not as vibrant as the photo because the outer layer is thin and the dark fleece shows through and mutes it a bit . I love it anyway. It works well and I was even able to wear it as an ear/head warmer under my bike helmet this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice warm winter scarf
customer_reviews.text: It was my fault for not reading details of product. I purchased as face mask for COVID-19 not realizing it was a winter scarf. That is my only complaint is it was too warm for my use but product was high quality
customer_reviews.author: NORWAYNIKO

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: At first it did have an odor. I washed it and the odor went away. It has been an extra “mask” during Covid. I really Luke to use it on windy days over the hair while walking. Keeps my hair out is my face.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This one is thick - so a bit warm to use in the summer if you are using it as a mask alternative. But it's a good quality. Reverses to black.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Warm, well-made, and beautiful pattern...
customer_reviews.text: This gaiter has been great since temps here in PA have fallen! It's well-made of good materials and seems like it's going to hold up over the years. The fleece liner is soft and warm, and I love the pattern on the outside. I'm really glad I got this for myself, and I'm keeping it on my idea list for Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Bee

customer_reviews.title: Love it; very effective against the cold.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is lightweight and protects better than most scarves I've owned. I hate bulkiness around my neck in the winter, but I thought it was a necessary evil, but here comes the solution. It's so warm, but still loose, and the print is actually a nice subtle pop. A win all in all and never going back to scarves after this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: This fits in different ways. I bought it to keep my nose warm while I walk and jog. It works, but it feels a little tight on my nose. I still use it. I just have to play with it to cover everything comfortably and not block my glasses fitting correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and function
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife to use on cold days when we walk the dogs. She loves the look and the overall comfort. She recommends it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Tomb

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my EBC Trek and it was a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my EBC Trek and it was a life saver. Everyone gets sick because of the cold mountain air but this thing really protected my throat and chapped lips. I also used it as a headband which came in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price for a fleece lined head warmer
customer_reviews.text: It could be a little Stretchier and maybe longer, so I ended up wearing it as a head wrap out in snow and it fit better that way.
customer_reviews.author: Ama

customer_reviews.title: my daughter loved using it
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought at discounted price. When my family went skiing, my daughter loved using it! So I decided to buy one more. As the descriptions and everyone say, this product is very comfortable and easily washed. I love the design of this warmer. It's small and doesn't take up a lot of space in my bag which is very important when you travel with so much stuff for skiing, etc.!
customer_reviews.author: AkaShiro

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: This is a good mixed color neck warmer that adds a punch of color to a black coat and outfits. It's easy to put on and off. I've hand washed it and dries nicely. I'd purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: C.B.

customer_reviews.title: I liked that I could reverse it to wear with both ...
customer_reviews.text: Wore on a recent ski trip. I liked that I could reverse it to wear with both my ski outfits. The double layer also meant more wind resistance. I could have folded this and worn it as a headband/ear warmer, or tied the top and used it as a beanie, which I may do in colder Texas running weather. Definitely recommend for anyone seeking style, functionality, and options. Great cold weather accessory!
customer_reviews.author: Emily M

customer_reviews.title: Well made, small
customer_reviews.text: It's very small, and will eff up your hair to put it on, but if that doesn't matter to you, it's warm and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Lisagail

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be fine for a guy with a normal face/head/neck combo. I like the patterning and it's actually quite warm.
customer_reviews.author: Gvaz The First

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for a CO ski trip & they were amazing! I love that they are reversible, with 2 different fabrics
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Great for asthma sufferers and neck pain sufferers.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have asthma and during the cold winter months I need to cover my mouth and nose when going outside or even sometimes from from to room indoors.. These are comfy and not too warm for indoors. For outdoors, I add a second layer to protect my breathing. Attractive patterns and colors. I've ordered three different patterns to go with my wardrobe. They're also wonderful for neck pain. They keep muscles warm and soft .
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Metzner

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and good for active outdoors
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product. It is lightweight with thin fleece for warmth. I bought this for my daughter that struggles with cold air when hiking or running.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Gutzler

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Quality product and quality customer service! The neck warmer is just the right thickness and taut-ness. Warm and comfortable, easily fits under my coat, and the pattern is pretty! I was contacted by customer service and their values and care about if I was happy are refreshing. Would definitely it from here again and recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: What a product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for 9 year old daughter to wear skiing. First day out was in -4 degree weather. Neck warmer is very well made, reversible fleece lined and toasty. She was able to pull up over nose to use as face shield. Buying 3 more for rest of family for upcoming value. Best neck warmer I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for warmth but I was concerned that it might be itchy or not fit well. This is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chris E.

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors
customer_reviews.text: It's black on one side with colorful patterns on the other side. I like the feel of the fabric on one side and fleece on the other. A winter time must for the great outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: jmumv

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but did not cover as much of my ...
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but did not cover as much of my neck as I anticipated. It sort of slouched down. However, I wore it when skiiing and I thought that it was a great alternative to a scarf, since I never had to worry about it falling off
customer_reviews.author: Sherri G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured, colors are great, very soft, seems warm, also can use as a face covering without being too hot!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy at $9.95
customer_reviews.text: Really love this item. I bought it for $9.95 and it was worth it. I holds up to long hikes and washing. It is warm and block the air as much as I would want it too. I would totally buy again if I need another.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wear while on the slopes. I love the pattern and the colors, also the different textures on both sides. It fits pretty snug on my neck, but I can still pull it up to my nose.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the quality of this neck warmer. I would have expected to have to pay a lot more for it.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: I love it and the different ways it can be worn
customer_reviews.text: Use this for when I go skiing and walking to class in the winter. Protects my face against the wind excellently. The pattern is very cute and lined with fleece on the inside. I love it and the different ways it can be worn.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great Company
customer_reviews.text: This was quality product. Arrived quickly. However, my sensitive skin had a reaction to it and was unable to use. Company very nice to work with and quickly resolved the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Lightweight but oh so warm. And deep enough to cover neck and mouth AND nose if you want. Ordered for a friend and she loves it too! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: wendy szat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for staying warm with winter runs
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I need for outdoor winter sports. I don't like tight turtleneck clothing due to sensitive skin but my neck does get cold. This fabric is warm without being heavy, not tight, and flexes to my needs, such as pulling up over my nose if really cold weather. I also like that it is reversible to suit my mood or other clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Book Ender

customer_reviews.title: Saved my ears and my face
customer_reviews.text: Used as neck warmer but was great as ear protection.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: use neckwarmer for motorcycle riding, keeps my neck warm, planning on ordering another one
customer_reviews.author: Mystic480

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for walking in the winter to keep the wind off my neck. It's very soft and comfortable and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kruegsmash

customer_reviews.title: Love this neck gaitor
customer_reviews.text: I love my new neck gaitor. I love the design of the fabric, the weight of it and how well it covers my neck, face and ears when it is bitter cold. I wear glasses and when I wear it over my nose, my breath goes through the fabric and not up to fog my glasses.
customer_reviews.author: sunset

customer_reviews.title: Great for warmth
customer_reviews.text: I really love this because it really traps your body heat in cold winters. But it's too large for my head (I think my head/face generally is just smaller than most people's) so it doesn't stay on around my ears and mouth. I'd have to tuck my chin down toward my neck to keep it from sliding down which was annoying when walking to school. Definitely keeps neck warm though!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Sinatra

customer_reviews.title: Just right for winter running
customer_reviews.text: This neck warmer is just right for winter running. You can also pull it up to cover your ears or wear it as a mask to warm the icy air before it goes into your lungs. The fleece lining is super soft and the fabric side has a little stretch to stay in place. I'm very happy with this purchase. Delivered fast too!
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Comfortable. Shorter than some other models, but since I don’t have a long neck, it works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kristensen

customer_reviews.title: Loved the pop of color from the print
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a ski trip at the end of winter. It kept my neck warm, did not overheat. The day was too warm to wear over my face to comment on how well it stays up. Loved the pop of color from the print.
customer_reviews.author: M. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Well made & cool patters & good quality
customer_reviews.text: The patters and feel and material is fantastic. wish I had about a half of an inch or inch of more slack its a tad snug but its fine I will still use it I have already has helped me with my sinus infection since this Texas weather cold snap has changed from 70s to 40s over night. I cant wait to test it out running in it. I would recommend this product for sure or give as gifts! I want to buy other cool patterns for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Pajarita

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this when I run in the mornings to keep the cold air off my neck. I attempted to put it up over my nose and mouth, but I don't like breathing through it. But, I do like how it keeps the cold air off my neck and from blowing down the back of my jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Wilfong

customer_reviews.title: 👍 These are good...
customer_reviews.text: These are great for keeping out the cold! Am a shift worker and even though we never get below zero,in Sunny Cali, (winter/spring) it's still really cold! I always have something around my neck, so this fits just right in. Comfortable! Breathable! Nice Colorful print! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Phiona

customer_reviews.title: This neck warmer is soft and warm and fantastic. I had been avoiding the beach this cold ...
customer_reviews.text: This neck warmer is soft and warm and fantastic. I had been avoiding the beach this cold time of year because my neck would get so cold -- everything else was protected. Now I can go ride my beach trike again.
customer_reviews.author: Alex a customer

customer_reviews.title: I put it on as soon as I got it and fell in love. The weather in my neck of the woods ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter and I to have on an upcoming ski trip. I put it on as soon as I got it and fell in love. The weather in my neck of the woods has been pretty chilly and walking the dogs requires me to wear "full body armor" to protect myself against the wind and the chill. This warmer is perfect! Not only great colors, but not too bulky and yet super warm. The soft fleece lining on the inside is like snuggling into your favorite throw. The price is right, so don't hesitate, you're gonna love it on or off the ski slope.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Parman

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: Love this - my job requires a lot of time outside working with large animals, so it's perfect that this is washable. Tried it out for the first time this morning and it worked perfectly. It was about 15 degrees this morning in Kansas and the neck warmer kept me warm all morning. I would definitely recommend this product and I am planning on buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Tonia Traas

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Neck Gaiter for my daughter for Lacrosse practice. Two hour practices outside are cold and bulky scarfs get in the way. This gaiter is light weight and fits her neck perfectly; she can pull it up over her mouth or wrap around her ears and head. The inside is soft fleece and the outside pattern makes it look cool for a young teenager.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Womens Neck Warmer - Winter Fleece Neck Gaiter & Ski Tube Scarf - Cold Weather Face Cover, Mask & Shield for Running, Skiing, Snowboarding - Ultimate Comfort, Thermal Retention & Versatility
feature_bullets: WARMTH & COMFORT: Our neck warmers are the perfect cold weather companion to keep you warm on your commute or on the ski lift.

MORE WARM FOR YOUR BUCK: Sportier than a scarf and more comfortable than a face mask, our neck gaiters gives you the best of both. Wear it around your neck, or pull it up to protect your mouth and nose. It’s like having a warm puppy hug on a cold day!

FIT & FINISH: The right fit means everything. Our fleece neck warmers keep you protected from the weather with a snug, lightweight fit you’ll barely even notice you’re wearing. We’ve combined stretch and warmth to keep you protected.

ROCK YOUR STYLE: Our neck warmers are reversible - rock one style on the slopes and another going out with friends. Most our neck warmers are black fleece on one side and a different color/print on the other. Check out our product photos!

THE PERFECT GIFT: This neck warmer is a great gift idea for the people who won’t give up when the weather gets, well… Tough. Give them as gifts to friends and family - just make sure to keep one for yourself!
